known_issues: Frozen UI state when backend.start_boardroom_debate() fails - missing error handler causing Push-to-Talk button to remain disabled

existing_features.title: In frontend/src/App.tsx, wrap the backend.start_boardroom_debate() call inside the handleTranscriptComplete function with a try/catch/finally block to handle connection failures
Inside the catch block of the handleTranscriptComplete error handler, add console.error logging to capture any connection issues or errors from the backend call
Inside the finally block of the handleTranscriptComplete error handler, reset the debating/loading state to false (e.g., setIsDebating(false)) to re-enable the Push-to-Talk button
